p: To establish baseline HA content in murine skin, we harvested dorsal and ventral skin from untreated male and female C57BL/6J at 1, 4, 6, 8, 15, and 24 weeks ( n = 30 total, 4–6 mice, with equal number of male and female mice included in the analysis at each age). These mice were maintained in standard lab conditions and received standard chow ad libitum at all time points.
